turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Starbucks Espresso Beverages, I would like to order a coffee drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick up a Starbucks espresso beverage from the nearest Starbucks that's on Archer Road in Gainesville. I'm going to Actually, I think I want a What are they called? A chai tea latte, actually, a chai tea latte. Or I guess And a Starbucks espresso beverage with it. I want size venti and no milk and I will.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sugar. And the street address is Archer Road, Gainesville. And the ZIP code is 32608.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, thanks for all that info! so you want a Venti Chai Tea Latte. Unfortunately, this only comes with milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and you wanted to add sugar, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me see here. I guess that would be all. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll send that one over to starbucks at 3524 SW Archer Rd , just one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your Venti Chai Latte order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
